question: Nakul Swasthya Patra is a “health card” issued to keep health record of _?
explanation: Government has announced four schemes for the maintaining the health of animals and livestock. These are “Pashudhan Sanjivani”, an animal wellness programme and provision of Animal Health Cards (‘Nakul Swasthya Patra’). Under this scheme, 8.5 crore animals in milk will be identified using UID and their data will be uploaded to the INAPH data base. Second is an advanced breeding technology. The third is Creation of E-Pashudhan Haat, an e market portal for connecting breeders and farmers and fourth is a National Genomic Centre for indigenous breeds.
